Posts.Content: Dec 21, 2010 08:54PM congetta wrote: Hi, I'm in the same catagory as you with triple neg. Stage 1, 1.2 cm. I had a lumpectomy and trying to make a decision on chemo. Also going for radiation. After you had chemo how did you feel? Any bad reactions or nausea? It took me a long time to decide about chemo but I think I'm taking it because they said there is a 30% chance it will come back without it. Please reply if possible and good luck with everything.
Posts.Title: CALLING ALL STAGE I SISTERS sheila888 MCBaker
